first_translate: a woman is inside that carriage!
I didn’t realize we were surrounded!
but I told you not to come out here!!!
your spells never cease to amaze me, my lady...
this one must be their leader.
we had no idea she was nobility.

hangle: 부잣집 아가씨 한 명 납치해 달라는 의뢰를 받아서…
first_translate: they asked us to kidnap some rich girl for them...

hangle: 손가락 몇 개가 날아가면 배후를 말하겠어?
first_translate: maybe if I cut off a few fingers, you'll tell me what I want to hear.
I swear on my life I really don’t know anything!
it looks like master has appeared before our eyes again through his ladyship...

hangle: 저들이 어디 길드 인간인지만 알아낸 뒤에 적당히 처리해요.
first_translate: first find out which guild they belong to, then deal with them appropriately.

hangle: 이미 이쪽은 사망자가 나왔으니 봐줄 필요 없어요.
first_translate: there have already been casualties on our side, so there’s no reason to go easy on them.
if you hesitate or show weakness, you will die.
you can’t leave any threats behind.
the house of halyeon is among the four great noble families,

hangle: 용병들이 특히나 신세를 지는 가문 아닌가!
first_translate: not to mention the ones most heavily involved with mercenary work!

hangle: 실은 여기 길드 용병에게 재밌는 일을 당해서,
first_translate: to make a long story short, something strange happened involving your guild members,
so I came to file a complaint.

hangle: 길드야 항상 중립이니까 시시콜콜하게 따질 생각은 없어.
first_translate: I understand that the guild always remains neutral, so I won’t nitpick over every little thing.
however, there is one thing I’d like to ask.
tell me the name of whoever requested this job.

hangle: 저희는… 의뢰인의 신원을 비밀로 하는 게 원칙이라…
first_translate: unfortunately, client confidentiality prevents us from disclosing such information...

hangle: 아무리 용병 길드라도 공작가를 적으로 돌리면 좋지 않을 텐데.
first_translate: even though you’re part of a mercenary guild, making enemies of a duchy isn’t good for anyone.
are you willing to risk upsetting us by refusing to answer?

hangle: 의뢰인의 가문이 우리 가문보다 신분이 높은가?
first_translate: is the family of the person who requested this higher than mine?

hangle: 아무래도 입을 열면 곤란한 것 같네.
first_translate: I suppose you wouldn’t dare open your mouth even if you wanted to.
that’s fine. let’s forget about it.

hangle: 대신, 당연히 다음부터는 이런 일이 있을 때 슬쩍 언질은 주겠지?
first_translate: in return, next time something like this happens, please give me advance notice.

hangle: 난 연약한 귀족 영애라 이런 일을 또 당하는 게 무섭거든.
first_translate: I'm only a weak noblewoman, after all. I'd hate to fall victim to another incident like this.

hangle: 이 일은 공작님께 나쁘지 않게 말씀 드릴 테니 걱정 마시고요.
first_translate: don’t worry, I’ll put in a good word for you when I speak to father.
then we shall be taking our leave.
be careful on your way back home!
the client ranks above the halyeons.
with this much info, I think I’ve got enough leads.

hangle: 지금 헤일론 저택의 사람들을 통째로 책임지고 있는 건 나니까.
first_translate: right now, everyone working under the halyeon manor falls under my responsibility.
I thought she might've become more cautious since defeating the dragon,
